description:
Cozy one bedroom apartment in Greenpoint, Brooklyn. 4 blocks to Subway Station, 2 blocks from bus stop & 10 min walk to the east river ferry. Steps to restaurants, bars, and shops. Perfect for someone on vacation or business travel.

Please note this is a 4th floor walk up.
